quiz.question: What is the most common cause of food poisoning?
options: Consuming food contaminated with bacteria or viruses

quiz.question: What is the first sign of food poisoning?
Which of the following is an effective way to prevent food poisoning?
options: Washing fruits and vegetables thoroughly before eating
Storing food at the proper temperature

quiz.question: Which chemical is considered dangerous if swallowed by children?
What is the first action to take if food poisoning is suspected?
options: Give the victim a large amount of water
Call emergency services or contact a poison control center
Ignore the situation and wait to see how the symptoms develop

quiz.question: What is the correct way to store meat and poultry?
options: Refrigerate or freeze them immediately after purchase
Store them with vegetables on the same shelf

quiz.question: What symptoms may indicate chemical poisoning?
options: Burning sensation in the throat or mouth
Difficulty breathing or loss of consciousness

quiz.question: Which groups are most at risk for food poisoning?
